mapper.insert: insert into database_mirroring_witnesses (database_name, principal_server_name, mirror_server_name, safety_level, safety_level_desc, safety_sequence_number, role_sequence_number, mirroring_guid, family_guid, is_suspended, is_suspended_sequence_number, partner_sync_state, partner_sync_state_desc) values (#{databaseName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{principalServerName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{mirrorServerName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{safetyLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{safetyLevelDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{safetySequenceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleSequenceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mirroringGuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{familyGuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSuspended,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isSuspendedSequenceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partnerSyncState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{partnerSyncStateDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})

insert into database_mirroring_witnesses
database_name,
principal_server_name,

safety_level,

safety_sequence_number,
role_sequence_number,

partner_sync_state,
partner_sync_state_desc,
